Tips from MindfulHelp

Practical small steps to support your wellbeing

Breathe, try short grounding exercises, and explore small, manageable changes you can adopt today.

Practical Tips

Breathing Exercise

Try the 4-4-4 technique: breathe in for 4, hold for 4, out for 4. Repeat 4 times.

Grounding

Name 5 things you can see, 4 you can touch, 3 you can hear, 2 you can smell, 1 you can taste.

Move a Little

A short walk or gentle stretch can shift your mood and reset your energy.

Connect

Reach out to someone you trust and share how you're feeling — small connections matter.
